title: Augusta County: Millard Fillmore to Alexander H. H. Stuart, July 5, 1848
summary: Fillmore denies being associated with abolitionism or being unfriendly to the South. He denies he ever held "any desire" to "interfere with the rights or what is termed the property of citizens of other States."
keywords: Slavery, Race Relations, Abolition, National Government, American Civil War
